lines.text: This is a swimsuit catalog shoot! Not Hustler!
Whoa, dude. You mean... you're a beach babe from beyond?
I'm so glad I met you.
And I can't ask for your phone number or your address?
Cheer up. Boys are like from another planet anyway. Who understands them?
Yeah, can't live with them, can't disintegrate 'em with a gamma deathray.
Gork, do you really think we should have left Xena alone? What if she gets into some trouble?
Don't worry, Yanna, it'll be fine. Besides, what kind of trouble could she get into? I trust her explicitly. Now more than ever, since she dumped that geekezoid Gonad.

How could I forget? Aaah. Just think, Yanna my little nebula of love, we got three whole days without having to listen to teenage gossip on the teletransmitter; aah, and not having to wait in line to use the fecal matter neutralizer.
